english.segment1: In a world of fate. Where no one seems to care. I feel so afraid but you are always there. When time stands still. And no one is around. You are there standing my ground
english.segment2: Cause I can feel you change my heart. You've overwhelmed me from the start. I can feel you change my mind for the better of mankind
english.segment3: You only take what's yours. Heaven knows I take much more. Shadows overcome my soul know you're here
